creditline: Gift of Carol and Jeffrey Horvitz
description: yellow/green/dark blue vase with constricted waist; wide mouth and narrower rounded base; series of vertical ridges around the exterior above and below the pinched waist; natural wood box with lid, marigold color cloth wrap and black and tan stripe tie
inscription: lid verso: 古城　花瓶; signed 楠部作 and red seal 楠部
markings: impressed makers mark and center on bottom; red seals on top of box lid and on corner of cloth wrap
title: Kojō flower vase
